data.name: ErrorIssue
data.value: Error

data.name: WarningIssue
data.value: Warning
Organisation ID must be a 6 digit number - for example, 100123
When packaging activity is entered, it must be one of the codes SO, PF, IM, SE, HL or OM
Packaging type must be one of the codes HH, NH, CW, OW, PB, RU, HDC, NDC or SP
When packaging class is entered, it must be one of the codes P1, P2, P3, P4, P5, P6, O1, O2 or B1
Packaging material must be one of the codes AL, FC, GL, PC, PL, ST, WD or OT
When packaging type is self-managed waste (CW or OW), from country must be one of England (EN), Northern Ireland (NI), Scotland (SC) or Wales (WS)
When packaging type is self-managed waste (CW or OW), and you send it to another country, the to country must be one of England (EN), Northern Ireland (NI), Scotland (SC) or Wales (WS)
Packaging material weight must be a whole number in kilograms. For example, 50000. Do not include the words 'kilograms' or 'kgs'.
Packaging material units must be a whole number
Cannot be going from and to the same country in the UK
To country is not needed for this packaging type
From country is not needed for this packaging type
Invalid combination of organisation size and packaging activity and packaging type
For large organisations (L), when packaging activity is supplied through an online marketplace that you own (OM), packaging type must be household packaging (HH) or non-household packaging (NH)
When packaging activity is supplied through an online marketplace that you own (OM), and packaging type is household packaging (HH), packaging class must be online marketplace total (P6)
When packaging activity is supplied through an online marketplace that you own (OM), and packaging type is non-household packaging (NH), packaging class must be online marketplace total (P6)
Invalid combination of packaging activity and packaging type and packaging class
When packaging type is non-household waste (NH), packaging class must be one of the codes P1, P2, P3 or P4
Packaging type is self-managed consumer waste (CW) so packaging class can only be self-managed consumer waste - all (O1)
Packaging type is self-managed organisation waste (OW) so packaging class can only be organisation waste - origin (O2)
Packaging type is household packaging (HH) so packaging class can only be one of primary packaging (P1), shipment packaging (P3) or online marketplace total (P6)
Packaging type is commonly ends up in public bins (PB) so packaging class can only be public bin (B1)
Packaging type is household drinks containers (HDC) or non-household drinks containers (NDC) so do not enter a packaging class
Packaging type is reusable packaging (RU) so packaging class can only be primary packaging (P1) or non-primary reusable packaging (P5)
Invalid combination of packaging class and packaging type
Packaging material for household drinks containers (HDC) and non-household drinks containers (NDC) must be one of aluminium (AL), glass (GL), plastic (PL) or steel (ST)
Packaging material units not needed for this packaging type
Packaging type is household drinks containers (HDC) or non-household drinks containers (NDC) so packaging material quantity must be a whole number
Duplicate information submitted
Organisation size must be L. Currently, only large organisations can report packaging data.
Sorry, an unexpected issue occurred (code 99). Please try your upload again later.
Column names in the selected file might be missing, incorrect or in the wrong order. Follow the guidance on how to structure your data submission.
Sorry, an unexpected issue occurred (code 89). Please try your upload again later.
The selected file contains a virus
When packaging material is other (OT), you must enter the name of the material in packaging material subtype. It must not include numbers or commas.
Packaging material subtype not needed for this packaging material
When packaging activity is entered, packaging type cannot be self-managed waste (CW and OW)
When packaging activity is not entered, packaging type can only be self-managed waste (CW and OW)
Enter the time period for submission
Subsidiary ID must only include letters a to z, and numbers. It must be 32 characters or less.
The selected file is empty
You're reporting packaging data for January to June 2023. Submission period must be 2023-P1 or 2023-P2.
You're reporting packaging data for July to December 2023. Submission period must be 2023-P3.

Your file was not uploaded. This is because the column headings are not in the right place.

Read the guidance about how to create your organisation details file. Once youâ€™ve fixed the problem, upload the file again.
When packaging type is self-managed waste (CW and OW), you must enter the from country
Submission period must be the same for all of this organisation's packaging data
Packaging material subtype cannot be plastic, HDPE or PET
When organisation size is large (L), packaging type cannot be small organisation packaging - all (SP)

Total weight of a single packaging material transferred to any country must not be more than the total collected. For example, you cannot transfer more plastic than you collect. Check the weight of this packaging material transferred to another country for all rows for this organisation.
Organisation ID must be the same as the identification number assigned to your organisation when your account was created
Packaging material weight is less than 100. Check all packaging weights are in kg and not tonnes.
Check packaging material weight (kg) and units are correct
Organisation ID must be the same as the identification number assigned to this organisation when they created their account. Check the organisation ID for all rows for this organisation.
Organisation ID is not linked to your compliance scheme. Check the organisation ID for all rows for this organisation.

Check the packaging material weight for all rows for this organisation. If the total for the reporting year is between 25,000kg and 50,000kg, this organisation may only need to register as a small organisation in the following year.
Packaging weight for this organisation has been entered as zero - please check this is correct before submitting a zero return
Only one packaging material reported for this organisation. Check you have entered all packaging materials. All must be reported separately.

For self-managed consumer waste (CW), you may not be able to offset your own packaging against aluminium (AL), glass (GL), paper or card (PC), or steel (ST). To check what packaging materials you can offset, you'll need to contact your nation's environmental regulator.
All fields must contain 4000 characters or less
The Organisation ID list in this file does not match the Organisation ID list in your organisation file
The list of partners need to match the one in the organisation details file. Check both files
The Subsidiary ID list in this file does not match the Subsidiary ID list in your organisation file
One or more subsidiary IDs do not match. Check both files and try again
You're reporting packaging data for January to June 2024. Submission period must be 2024-P1, 2024-P2 or 2024 P3.
You're reporting packaging data for July to December 2024. Submission period must be 2024-P4.
Subsidiary ID does not exist. Check file and try again.
Subsidiary ID is assigned to a different organisation. Check file and try again.
Subsidiary ID does not belong to any organisation.
Transitional Packaging Units Invalid
Organisation size must be S (Small) or L (Large). Check file and try again.
Organisation size must be S (Small) or L (Large). Check file and try again.
Organisation size must be S.
Packaging type must be SP or HDC.
Packaging class must be P1, P2, P3, P4 or P6.
From country must be blank.
To country must be blank.
Packaging material weight must have a value greater than 0.
Packaging material quantity must have a value greater than 0.
Packaging class must be empty.
Turnover for this organization is recorded as zero. Please verify this is correct before submitting a zero return
